sentences.en: A sol considered as a whole cannot have a net charge.
sentences.cn: 一种胶体,就其整体而言可认为不带净电荷.

sentences.en: A sol that consists of solid particles suspended in a liquid is a colloidal suspension.
sentences.cn: 由固体微粒悬浮在液体中所组成的溶胶叫胶态悬浮体.

sentences.en: An agent that causes a liquid or sol to coagulate.
sentences.cn: 胃液中的一种酶,能使乳类凝结.

sentences.en: Bi 4 ? xLaxTi 3 O 12 ( BLT ) thin films were prepared on p - Si substrates by using sol - gel method at low temperature.
sentences.cn: 采用sol-gel工艺低温制备了Si基Bi4? xLaxTi3O12 ( BLT ) 铁电薄膜.

sentences.en: I remembered Sol , of whom I hadn't thought in years.
Muscles examined included soleus ( SOL ), medial grastrocnemius ( MG ), lateral grastrocnemius ( LG ) and extensor digitorum longus ( EDL ).
sentences.cn: 4wk后,取大鼠比目鱼肌 ( SOL ) 、 腓肠肌内侧头 ( MG ) 及外侧头 ( LG ) 与趾长伸肌 ( EDL ),并称其湿重.

sentences.en: Several primary methods of depositing YBCO are emphasized, such as PLD, LPE, CSD and sol - gel.
sentences.cn: 着重介绍了YBCO超导 涂层的几种主要制备方法, 即脉冲激光沉积法(PLD) 、 液相外延法(IPE) 、 化学溶液沉积法(CSD) 、溶胶 - 凝胶法(sol-gel )等.

sentences.en: Shall I press the keys Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol?
sentences.cn: 我可以弹Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol这几个键 吗 ?

sentences.en: Sol and Bender are extraordinary mathematicians.
sentences.cn: 索尔和本德确实是非凡的数学家.

sentences.en: Sol is not in the squad but he should be for Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 索尔也不会出场,但是他应该在下周二的比赛中复出.

sentences.en: The citrate sol - gel synthesis method has been used to prepare zinc ferrite.
sentences.cn: 采用硝酸铁、硝酸锌、柠檬酸制备前驱体,在不同加热温度与速率下制备锌铁氧体.

sentences.en: This procedure is obviously much more tedious than sol analysis.
sentences.cn: 这一方法与溶胶分析相比过于繁重.

sentences.en: This reflected the stability of HAP sol of surface modification.
sentences.cn: 这些说明通过对HAP粒子表面改性后,HAP水溶胶体系稳定.

sentences.en: This work presented advanced techniques for preparing aluminium hydroxide sol by aluminium.
sentences.cn: 利用价格便宜的纯铝制备氢氧化铝溶胶.

sentences.en: Though I'm a teacher, Sol has taught me a bit , as, mostly by example.
sentences.cn: 虽然我的职业是老师, 但是Sol也教我很多, 大部份藉著例子.

words.tran_cn: 溶胶；索尔（秘鲁的货币）；全音阶中的第五音

trans.tran_en: the Roman god personifying the sun
